text:
October 23, 1956
Miss Anna L. %er
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street Northwest
Washington 6, D. C*
Dear Ann*
Nice to see you. Do you need anything further, beyond the oral discussion we
had? I assume you* 11 proceed to get tapes directly from sources except far
those where we or the Center own the rights.
Still in a little rush. Madame Pas is with us for a couple of days and we're
trying to get maximum value from her stay here.
Sincerely,
HJStdfc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
